response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its field. Its value extends far beyond its tangible components, offering unparalleled benefits and opportunities for growth. Given its significance, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity tailored for discerning individuals like yourself who appreciate exceptional value. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 950000}
